Package org.rapla.mobile.android.widget

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DynamicListItem
    Interface for list items that are created at runtime and don't have a static layout.
    RaplaReservationAttribute
    Interface for custom widgets that can have a reservation being bound to.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatePickerSpinner
    This widget combines a spinner widget with a date picker dialog.
    DatePickerSpinner.DatePickerOnDateSetListener
    This listener listens to the save button of the date picker dialog and refreshes the spinner with the selected date.
    DatePickerSpinner.SpinnerOnTouchListener
    This listener listens to touch events on the spinner widget and displays the date picker dialog.
    DynamicListItemViewWrapper
    Wrapper class for a view instance so that it can be attached to a list of dynamic list items.
    RaplaAttribute<V>
    Base class for all rapla attributes of dynamic types.
    RaplaAttributeBoolean
    This class wraps a rapla dynamic type attribute of type boolean and provides the necessary interface for being a list item.
    RaplaAttributeCategory
    This class wraps a rapla dynamic type attribute of type category and provides the necessary interface for being a list item.
    RaplaAttributeDate
    This class wraps a rapla dynamic type attribute of type date and provides the necessary interface for being a list item.
    RaplaAttributeInt
    This class wraps a rapla dynamic type attribute of type integer and provides the necessary interface for being a list item.
    RaplaAttributeString
    This class wraps a rapla dynamic type attribute of type string and provides the necessary interface for being a list item.
    RaplaCategorySpinner
    The rapla category spinner is a drop-down widget.
    RaplaCategorySpinner.ApplyOnClickListener
    Listener for the dialog's apply button.
    RaplaCategorySpinner.CancelOnClickListener
    Listener for the dialog's cancel button.
    RaplaCategorySpinner.SpinnerOnTouchListener
    The listener class shows a RaplaCategoryChoiceDialog and thereby allows for selecting a category from the tree.
